ygData.subject: Re: Selo's and root
ygData.msgSnippet: When Kithicor first became undead hell, I got rooted by an undead healer(?), was able to run into Rivervale, and once I had zoned in, discovered that I was
ygData.messageBody:
When Kithicor first became undead hell, I got rooted by an undead
healer(?), was able to run into Rivervale, and once I had zoned in,
discovered that I was rooted.

Early Last week I was in unrest and got rooted, I broke out on the next
pulse. managed to zone out, and once again discovered that I was rooted
OUTSIDE the zone.

> Message: 24
> Date: Tue, 16 Nov 1999 13:53:30 -0500 (EST)
> From: <kim@...>
> Subject: Re: Selo's and root
>
> On Tue, 16 Nov 1999, Eric Boller wrote:
> >
> > Although Selo's does not break root anymore I thought
> > we had determined that it would on the next pulse if
> > you were playing it before being rooted. Well, last
> > night in Mistmoore this did not appear to be the case.
>
> It may have been changed/fixed. Someone reposted a reply from
> GZ I think at the Concert Hall message board, in which he said
> Verant decided Accel breaking root was too powerful so they
> removed it. :-(
